website_summaries.verdict: A basic cordless leaf blower that takes a battery that's compatible with other WORX Power Share tools.
pros: Battery sold separately, though there is an option to buy with battery
Leaf blower uses a lithium-Ion long-life battery
Able to get into and clear difficult to reach places
Air volume is able to clear 80 cfm and reaches 120 MPH air speed
Use to clear debris from floors, concrete surfaces, workshops, and dry cars
Takes the same 20-volt battery as other WORX power Share tools
cons: Not enough power for some users

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Battery not included 😕 missed that. Will be returning. For the price and negative reviews isn’t worth it to purchase a battery and charger. I should have looked more closely it will cost to send it back. Who sells a cordless piece of equipment without a battery??
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Mostly like... one big beef
customer_reviews.text: This advertises as if a blower with suction. For example it comes with all sorts of attachments that would otherwise come with a vacuum. However, it only blows. Silly! I called the reps and the lady told me that, “Nope, it only blows.” When I asked why then did it come “with a vacuum hose, brushes and small narrow tools for small to get to spots“ she had no answer. So, basically, the “tools” are sitting on a shelf collecting dust... waiting to be repurposed. Otherwise, I’d have given 5 stars and a high recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: A Crotwell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I own a few work products and I like everything them! They are everything as advertised. However, this blower is weak! My battery was fully charged and ran out before I could finish my driveway. It's the first time that's ever happened! I believe for the cost of this blower a battery should be included!
customer_reviews.author: Haucr0

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution for cleaning my large back porch. There are always leaves or flower buds that land... and the cat ends up eating them... and .. well you know what happens next.. usually on the carpet. Having a simple cordless blower like this WORX WG545.9 AIR 20V was a perfect solution.. especially since I already had the battery and charger which I got with my WORX JAWSAW. (Also an amazing product). Two thumbs up for this leaf blower.. perfect for the porch.
customer_reviews.author: CAMPFIRESKY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this tool! I am 70 and have arthritis in my hands, so yard work is sometimes too difficult for me. But this blower is lightweight enough for me to handle, is powerful enough for my needs (quarter mile sidewalk and drive) and let’s me get back out in the fresh air and sunshine. I have other Worx tools, so I have three batteries...... one in the tool, one ready to use and one in the charger..... a good little system!
customer_reviews.author: diane hughes

customer_reviews.title: Portable Battery Powered Blower
customer_reviews.text: I have several Worx battery powered tools so I already had the batteries and chargers to fit this blower. I bought it specifically to use with my RV when camping since it is light weight and does a great job of clearing debris off the top of my 5th wheel trailer and slideouts. I also use it to blow leaves and debris off the outdoor carpet, which helps me keep the inside nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: htg1969

customer_reviews.title: not for yard
customer_reviews.text: This blower doesn't say "good only on pavement" anywhere until you buy it. Open it up and in the instructions, it says it's only good on pavement and not for use on leaves in the grass. It is totally worthless to me. Our leaves are on our lawn, not our driveway. My husband says he'll use it to blow cut grass of the sidewalk and driveway. I say phooey. Now I have to buy another one and hope it can be used on our lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Light duty - not a leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Good for sweeping as intended but don't expect to move anything large with it or anything that is stuck to the surface you are sweeping. Having said that, I think that’s the whole idea behind this product. You move dirt, you don’t blast it into the air like a leaf blower might. Nice for blowing out the garage. Keeps what you are blowing at a low level. The attachments are hard to get on and off and anyone with hand/dexterity issues will find it very difficult to manipulate the attachment catch. Not a bad deal for $42 though.
customer_reviews.author: Vader540

customer_reviews.title: Very weak
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted by the price and prospect of reusing existing batteries. I must say the power is very underwhelming. My wired electric blower feels like a hurricane compared to this. For example, it won't move a stack of leaves thicker than 6 inches. I actually ended up raking with my feet off frustration. The 20V battery life is about 15 minutes which also seems weak compared to the hedger. This is disappointing, but cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for quickly blowing dirt and grass
customer_reviews.text: Being on a corner lot, I have a lot of sidewalk that my HOA (grrrr....) requires me to sweep after I mow and edge. This was easy to use, inexpensive, and lightweight. I also used it to blow out dirt from the garage in those hard to reach places. I also have used it a few times to inflate my kids' punching bag several times. Very handy tool. I suppose a bigger blower might be faster on the sidewalk, but this is good enough for me. Also, don't keep your batteries in the garage in hot weather. I keep my batteries inside in my utility room and they last much longer that way.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: good light duty / small yard blower
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for what it is... I would call it a light duty sweeper more than a full on landscaping blower... it comes with some nice attachments that allow it to work as an inflator and some other uses... it is very light and easy to get into tight spaces. I would at that this "worx" as expected but if you have heavy duty yard cleanup I would go with gas or plugin... overall I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DanInSoCalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My leaves laff at this blower
customer_reviews.text: I use as many tools from Worx and so far I find them to be innovative and well made.....but this little Wimpy-dick blower has no discernable power. I don't think this could blow the hat off a bald headed man. Too much trouble to return it for something better and to say I am disappointed would be an understatement.....it is just crap. Don't waste money on this blower. Get something that blows...this one sucks.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Norris

customer_reviews.title: A great leaf blower.
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I could say is, the batteries go dead rather quickly. However, everything else is good. I would suggest purchasing at least two extra batteries (3 total). Yes, it's well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Under-Powered
customer_reviews.text: It was very light and maneuverable, however that comes at a cost because there is no horsepower behind it and the blower is very weak, especially after the battery has been used for a few minutes. Would not recommend if you need it for even the most basic lawn clipping blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this a better rating but it has absolutely no power at all. It barely has the power to blow a dry leaf off of dry concrete. And you have to position the blower almost touching the leaves or grass in order to move it. I am very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mama Jama

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shop blower rather than the lawn blower because it is lighter weight 3.5 lbs vs 5.7 lbs and listed at 120 mph vs 60-90 mph. Cleans the garage floor, driveway and sidewalk after mowing and trimming. That is all I ask it to do and it does it very well. Lighter and quieter than my old corded blower. Using one of the two batteries that came with the string trimmer. Love It...
customer_reviews.author: mick coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice, for anything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked the idea of having a smaller blower for touching up around the yard. I knew it wasn't high powered, but this thing is barely capable of blowing grass off the sidewalk. Reviews that compare it to a hair dryer are not far off.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

customer_reviews.title: I love WORX!
customer_reviews.text: Worx is a great brand! I have slowly converted many of my gas tools to worx cordless. Yes the power on this blower isn’t as strong as my cordless ridgid blower. I love the slider control on the top! I used it for blowing dirty and leafs off my patio and it does a great job! Worx batteries are cheap to replace so you don’t sweat about buying a few backups!
customer_reviews.author: Honest1

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was not expecting for sweeping air power to be as strong. Its no way as strong as a gas or electric powered but it gets the job done. It does drain the batteries much faster then the weed trimmer, but I have four them so I always have the extras charged and ready to go. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the product, one attachment was found missing. Call Amazon, the service person is very helpful. The missing part was delivered and received after 5 weeks. A little slow, but received anyway. The blower is not very powerful. It can blow the leaved on the drive way, but not on the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: AAMH

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: Not enough power to blow leaves on lawn. I would find a more powerful one. My corded 150 mph blower works better to blow the debris off the porch & pool areas. For lawn I think I want a gas model or at least more powerful model.
customer_reviews.author: Joey A

customer_reviews.title: Multifunction
customer_reviews.text: Got this thought it would be multi function blower but the cfm is a little on the low side. If it has better power, it would dry the car much faster and would be able to blow the leaf better. Hopefully it will have improvement later.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Dust blower and fire starter.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for leaf blowing. That being said, it is wonderful for blowing out dust in the garage and also getting a fire going good. Very tiny compared to a normal leaf blower, but perfect for what I use and bought it for. I let my two-year-old use it when I'm leaf blowing and he loves it. So I guess this could be an outside toy as well, under supervision I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: What should I do now ?
customer_reviews.text: I open the box and there’s no battery . Where is the battery ?
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: No battery or charger
customer_reviews.text: The item was not clear about needing to separately purchase a battery and charger. The tool ONLY works with a battery. Did I not discover they weren't included until i opened the box. The purchaser should be directed to the appropriate battery and charger before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This blower is awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size for me to clean off the sidewalk and driveway after mowing. It is light weight and doesn't make my arm sore when using. The battery is easy to put on and take off. I love all of the WORX tools! These are great tools for ANYONE to use.
customer_reviews.author: pecan

customer_reviews.title: It  does what they say it will do. Great attachments to accomplish other jobs.
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned my long sidewalk, my large driveway, and even inside the garage and battery was still going strong. Love the light weight tool, No complaints, will buy more WORX products.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Knew I would be pleased. Already owned one but lost it off the back of my Van before I rcvd this one. Was going to give my used one to a friend but now I guess it's finders keepers
customer_reviews.author: della review

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better..
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Worx blower (lost my first one in my divorce). However, despite using two different 20V batteries and chargers to run this machine, the blower only stayed on for less than 5 seconds. Also the on/off button was very difficult to use. I'm returning this machine and won't buy another. I'll try another brand instead
customer_reviews.author: janetp

customer_reviews.title: Great little blower.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blower, light weight, very handy to blow off my patio. Love not having to get the extension cord out, then try to maneuver around the patio furniture, doesn't blow as hard as the electric, but it's so much easier to use. A little disappointed at the battery life, but have two batteries so not a big problem. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: This little blower is pretty convenient for small to medium jobs, and I love the fact that I can go anywhere without having to worry about a chord. The one drawback is that it's obviously not as powerful as a corded blower. So expect to be a bit more patient when doing your yard work. That being said, I'm glad I got it and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I can weed eat with the same battery for a good 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I can weed eat with the same battery for a good 20 minutes. The issue is that the blower may run about 4 minutes on the same battery. Perhaps the unit is defective. With the weed eater, there is much resistance. a blower is just a fan! Why does this blower guzzle all the juice from the battery so quickly? It is nice not to have the cord dragging around though.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Baltunis

customer_reviews.title: blower
customer_reviews.text: works great as a sweeper. I use it blow the leaves from my carport and walkway. I don't use it a blower to blow leaves in the yard into a pile. It is probably too weak for that, but as a sweeper, its great!
customer_reviews.author: 53burb

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as the 40 v model.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for saw dust and cleaning dry leaves from the walkways. Makes a good companion to the pole saw I bought. Have not explored the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: chipster

customer_reviews.title: WORX WG545.9 AIR 20V Multi-Purpose Blower/Sweeper/Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping my porch and deck clean, also hubby uses it to blow out the garage. Arrived quickly and well packaged. I've used it a few times on my porch and deck and prob half a dozen times in the garage and I still haven't drained the battery...
customer_reviews.author: Kimi Pyles

customer_reviews.title: EZ to use, Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Moderate Blowing power, like 90 mph.. needs 135 mph, to really get the grass and leaves moving,rechargeable battery life about 20 minutes get 2nd battery.. Do Not Buy the Worx Lawnmower "Expensive and Worthless"
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Blows great and good size
customer_reviews.text: Worx is batting a 100 0 with their line of products. Blower is smaller than traditional leaf and debris blowers. But don't let that fool you. This blower blows very well for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ware

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We got this product because we needed something easy to use. It is wonderful. Easily charged and very usable. My 9 year old grand daughter helped me blow off the patio. We got this as a compliment to the weed eater. I would recommend both of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Symanski

customer_reviews.title: No battery
customer_reviews.text: Product is of good quality. It is very important to recognize that this does not come with a battery or charger. If you already own a Worx product you MAY be all set.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gray

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I am using it for. It is a little weak but sometimes the full power blowers are too strong and hard to control where the dirt is going. This blower is east to direct light weight, great for cleaning up grass clippings after mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so much more convenient than my old electric leaf blower! Not as powerful, but still gets my sidewalks clean, no problem. I already owned the 20V power share trimmer with two batteries, so I ordered this without a battery or charger. So far, I've been able to mow, edge, and blow the debris from the yard without having to recharge batteries. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for routine blowing, not so good for heavier duty.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great for light blowing of dry leaves and grass trimmings. Just wish it had two speeds, if so would have given it 5 stars. For two speeds and extra power, I later bought the corded version. Bought one of those for my son for Christmas. He raved about it. So now I have both and use them each according to conditions of the job. Pros: freedom from the many hassles of a power cord; Cons: only one speed and uses up full charge in 7-10 minutes with 2.0 AH battery, much better with 4.0 AH, which I also use. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Oldster

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love the power this has and it's so light in weight it's easy to use. I use it to clean off the lawn clippings and leaves on back patio. I haven't even used all the accessories yet but I love this handy little machine. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this one - you will be so happy you did!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! It is light and compact and really can blow! I have used many leaf blowers, but this one is the best I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Skyrocket

customer_reviews.title: Love this little blower
customer_reviews.text: I got this little blower for blowing the grass off my driveway after mowing. I already have a gas blower I use in the fall for leaves. For everything else I use this. I love it because it's battery powered and very light. It's great for small jobs. The negative reviews are from people who think this will have the power of their $800 backpack blower. If you're blowing dust and grass clippings this little worx is a 5/5 in my book.
customer_reviews.author: michael j.

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry cars
customer_reviews.text: Got it to dry my car after washing, does not work for this purpose. Ok for sidewalk grass and leaf blowing
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It clears well, light weight, appears to be good quality. Really good! Only negative is that it is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Beals

customer_reviews.title: Love this blower
customer_reviews.text: Love this blower. Lightweight and has just the right amount of power. I can control the area that I am blowing better than with the bigger more powerful blowers. I use it to blow the grass cuttings off the walk and driveway. Have never run out of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dee

customer_reviews.title: Worx great
customer_reviews.text: My husbands uses several products by Worx. He enjoys the ability to use the batteries interchangeably. The products are light weight & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: belinda roberts

customer_reviews.title: but I just use it to slow leaves off the walkway and it is fine. I to use a gas one for tough ...
customer_reviews.text: works well for me. others say it lacks power, which is true, but I just use it to slow leaves off the walkway and it is fine. I to use a gas one for tough jobs to be honest, but I use the rechargable for the quick and easy wotk. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Sreve Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great for residential use
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for blowing grass clippings and mulch that washes onto walkways after a rain. Good power and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaRob

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with 40 v Worx battery.
customer_reviews.text: States in description that it is compatible with 20v and 40 v Worx batteries. I have a Worx weed eater with 40 v battery that does not work in this blower. I called the company to make sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jkb

customer_reviews.title: They all work as described !
customer_reviews.text: I have a few Worx,s tools and have a very positive opinion of the brand, I now have 6 batteries so i can keep on cutting tree limbs, blowing leaves and grass , weed wacking ..:)
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool! Great for getting tree leaves out of the garden, crape myrtle flowers off the side walk and cleaning up clippings after mowing and edging.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Should have done this sooner
customer_reviews.text: already had a Worx trimmer with two batteries so this was a great addition. As stated by other, it doesn't have a lot of power as a leave blower, but perfect for cleaning of the patio and sidewalk after mowing and trimming. Sure beats sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I order a blower, weed eater or whatever, I assume, and that was my mistake that it comes ready to work except for gas if needed. I took it out of the box, and slap my butt, no battery. It comes separately. If I have to put more money in an item, I might as well buy gas operated instead of battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Iguana

customer_reviews.title: Costs WAY more then advertised price
customer_reviews.text: This is nice little blower....BUT! It is a RAW tool. The blower is $57. Then you have to buy a $50 20v battery, then you have to buy a $50 charger. So its really a $150 in the end. You can find the complete package for far less.
customer_reviews.author: W. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Light and perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: As with all my Worx tools, this little blower is great. Very, very, light and perfect for blowing off the deck, garage floor, sidewalk, etc. without going to the trouble of getting the large blower out.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Winthrop

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful. But works well enough for light jobs. Worked fine when I cleaned out my dryer vent, but not too good for cleaning leaves out of my eavestroughs. Like that it is very lightweight and can use it indoors.
customer_reviews.author: GunsDonovan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on commercials I had seen on TV. I had a heavy duty, corded, electrical blower and I was tired of messing with the cords. This blower works great and is perfect for my yard and driveway. I already had purchased other Worx products, so I was familiar with this line of power tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ben D.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST LEAF BLOWER YOU WILL EVER OWN
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for clearing out your garage, your deck or patio even small lawns. Lightweight and super easy to use and control. Worx makes the best products!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy blower.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to Handle. A quick to tidy up my patio. Not quite as powerful as my corded blower but sufficient for dried leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Edgel Alley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well and the battery time is much longer then my older battery powered blower. It is not as powerful as a gas blower but it works well because I have a stone driveway and doesn't move the stones
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great 20v li-ion product for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Very light and easy to handle. No electrical cords to get in the way. Same 20v li-ion battery as used in my combo trimmer/edger. Con: two speeds -- on and off. No variable speed control. This is not enough to deter me from using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Cary

customer_reviews.title: Nice light duty blower but needs longer battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light duty blower that's easy to use. It's lightweight and Ideal for blowing out your garage or porches. I would have given it 5 stars if the battery life was 30 minutes instead of 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Real light. Uses my 20 volt batteries I have for my trimmerd
customer_reviews.text: I have one so bought another one for her new house. I use mine to blow off sidewalk after I mow. She’s gonna use it to blow leaves out her rocks
customer_reviews.author: Don L Steig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my purposes (garage, driveway, planting beds, drying car/truck! Many accessories. Will still use corded blower for fall leaves.
customer_reviews.author: bookman46

customer_reviews.title: Worx battery is interchangeable
customer_reviews.text: Good power, lots of accessories, slightly heavy. Interchangeable battery a plus
customer_reviews.author: Larry Flor

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have a Worx vac/blower that uses a heavy extension cord. This is so much easier to grab and blow the Fall leaves for the street sweeper to get after trash day.
customer_reviews.author: sargant

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight, but powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: A remarkable efficient blower with a better than expected battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Celia A. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used the blower with a fully charged 20V battery that was brand new. The blower worked, but wasnt even close to having the power that I expected. Cant even imagine how useless it would be if I were to try to blow a pile of leaves. You'd be there all day. For super small jobs it might be fine, but beyond that- forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moved and left it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same one and does more then a great job, so light and easy !!!
customer_reviews.author: carjeff

customer_reviews.title: Good enough is usually neither.
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as a cheap plug in; but very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kellyg

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this product. Worst product I’ve bought from Amazon. Thought I could use this to blow all the leaves from my lawn. Boy was I wrong ! Battery lasted 15 to 20 minutes tops. This product might be useful for blowing out a flower bed or sweeping a sidewalk or patio but forget about it for your lawn. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: John Tuey

customer_reviews.title: About the same power as a hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but very little power. I knew would be less than a plug in leaf blower, but very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good light weight sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for light duty by the elderly (me).
customer_reviews.author: Capt John O. Graybeal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for smaller jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect to quickly clear off cut grass from patios and walkways.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: WORX WG545.9 AIR 20V Multi-Purpose Blower/Sweeper/Cleaner with Accessories
customer_reviews.text: WORX WG545.9 AIR 20V Multi-Purpose Blower/Sweeper/Cleaner with Accessories is very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: RonzHouse

customer_reviews.title: Great power but light weight
customer_reviews.text: A lot of power and light weight. Already had the batteries for the lawnmower. It does use the battery pretty quickly but able to get the job done. Because I have the lawnmower I have two batteries
customer_reviews.author: C Rose

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Uses the same battery as my trimmer which is the reason I purchased. Wish it had a little more power but works for what I need like blowing off my driveway after trimming and mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d be lost without my blower!
customer_reviews.text: I love it for myself to blow off porch, garage, & driveway. I gave three of them as gifts, I like it so much. I think I have had mine for more than ten years!!!
customer_reviews.author: barbara Thomas

customer_reviews.title: this tool
customer_reviews.text: The very best all around tool in my box. Does all that the reviews on You Tube say, Dido ,fantastic tool thank you Worx.
customer_reviews.author: sid

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy clean-up after edging and mowing.
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight battery operated blower makes quick and easy work of cleaning up sidewalks and driveway after edging and mowing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mikol

customer_reviews.title: So light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as powerful as a gas powered, but it works fine for what I need it for...cleaning leaves and cut grass from my driveway. It’s so lightweight and easy to swap out for a new battery when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice n lightweight but could be slightly more powerful blowing motor....great for cleaning garage and sawdust, dry leaves, but not strong enough for heavier wet leaves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for light duty.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Not as much power as a larger plug in or gas powered unit.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Just charge and go!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this blower. No fumes and mixing fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.E

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: It will blow away light things and that is all.
customer_reviews.author: F F

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: it works fine but I also use it to inflate a airbed and it lacks to power to really make it firm. Other than that I like the unit. I use it to clean out the back of my pickup truck and for that job it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower for it's intended use
customer_reviews.text: Nice blower with shop cleaning accessories. Don't expect this to match a gas powered blower, It's definitely not the tool I would use for fall cleanup of leafs and pinecones. It will do a pretty decent job for it's intended use.
customer_reviews.author: SeanG

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more when I need them
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 work products and everyone is excellent. I will buy more when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie  maunder

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Underpowered, but fine for blowing dust out of large PC's and dry grass off of the pavement or a lawn mower. Definitely not for regular leaf blowing.
customer_reviews.author: An observer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for light jobs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for what you pay for it. Has enough oomph to moves leaves but not much more, light sand can be blown but takes a bit of battery to do so. Gave it a 4 only because we would all like a longer stronger battery but this blows for about 10 minutes so enough for small jobs like the patio. I am getting another for our second home in the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Price drop
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, price drops the day I receive mine$4.29 . Any Rebate??
customer_reviews.author: Donald Tanguay

customer_reviews.title: Swap batteries with other items.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not as powerful as i was hoping, but fir the money its great!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Unger

customer_reviews.title: Its just right for blowing the grass off the sidewalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Its just right for blowing the grass off the sidewalk without having to plug in cords all over the place! So much handier! Wish batteries would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Windy
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not a hurricane but a good strong storm
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Power felt low
customer_reviews.text: Good if you already have the batteries but power felt low
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Definately well made.
customer_reviews.text: Works satisfactorily. Comparable to other battery operated. This one is still working.
customer_reviews.author: El Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Just works.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the leaves off my porch no problem. That’s what I bought it for, so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbo

product_meta.title: WORX WG545.9 AIR 20V Multi-Purpose Blower/Sweeper/Cleaner with Accessories, Bare Tool Only
product_meta.description: Put away the broom and the cords and make sweeping up the mess quicker and easier. The 120 MPH air speed clears debris from your sidewalks, garage, workshop, patios and driveways quicker and with less fatigue. The lightweight and compact design allows it to clear hard-to-reach areas. Use the WORX Blower/Sweeper after mowing, grass trimming, or clearing debris from floors and patios. It is fast, simple and easy to use for sweeping hard surfaces. 85 percent of the dirt in your home is tracked, blown, or carried in from entry points like your garage, deck, porch, or workshop. The WORX AIR is a multi-purpose blower with eight convenient attachments to create a clean zone around the entry points to your home. With the WORX AIR, clean-up is easier and faster when you do not have to move a single thing. The WG545.9 gives you cordless clean up without any smelly exhaust or tangled cords. THIS IS A BARE TOOL ONLY AND DOES NOT COME WITH THE 20V BATTERY OR CHARGER. THE WG545.9 WORKS WITH WORX 20-VOLT BATTERIES.
feature_bullets: Lithium Ion battery technology for long life, lightweight, no self discharge, no memory effect
Clears hard to reach places. Air volume is 80 cfm
120 MPH air speed to clean up large areas
Sweeps debris from floors, patios, garages and shops
Tool Only, battery and charger sold separately. Share batteries across all your 20V Power Share WORX tools so you never run out of power
